for a in range(input()):
    ins = sorted(val for val in raw_input())
    if ins[0]=="0":
        for x in range(1,len(ins)):
            if int(ins[x])>0:
                ins[0] = ins[x]
                ins[x] = "0"
                break
            
    if "".join(ins) == raw_input():
        print "AC"
    else:
        print "WA"
